Class FurnitureStore

java.lang.Object
FurnitureStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
FURNITUREInterface
public class FurnitureStore extends Object implements FURNITUREInterface
The FurnitureStore class implements the FIRE FURNITUREInterface interface. It represents a furniture store with information about furniture items, customer orders, and furniture suppliers.

  • Constructor Details

    • FurnitureStore

      public FurnitureStore(String storeName, String location)
      Constructs a new FurnitureStore with the given storeName and location. Initializes lists for furnitureItems, customerOrders, and suppliers. Calls methods to load initial data.
      Parameters:
      storeName - The name of the furniture store.
      location - The location of the furniture store.
